Hard to get into, it takes a lot of patience to learn the game and deal with some of the bullshit it mat throw at you. Once you learned the game though, it can be lots of fun and more than well worth your time. I have enjoyed this game for (at the time of review) 438 hours on PC and 427 hours on Xbox. I heavily recommend playing it with a friend that has some expirence with the game already when trying to first get into it, they can show you a thing or two and the game is also much more enjoyable with others. Also try playing survivor first, then swap to some killer once you feel comfortable with the basics of the game.
I hope you enjoy this game as much as I do, gl and hf!

P.S: DON'T ATTEMPT ESCAPE ON HOOK! It's a last ditch effort if your team is completely screwed, it's a 4% chance.

this game is really fun and easy to get into as ranked match making makes it very even and clean. the graphics are beautiful and the mechanics are fine. the load in time as a killer is a little unbelievable as it takes a good 10 minutes to find a game and there are a few bugs and glitches but the developers get right on to them and fix them quickly. the games is very much not pay to win and it's very balanced as it doesn't matter who you play killer or survivor you get a good experience.

This is a Player vs Player game with a lot of depth. It's asymmetric. That means that both sides of the battle do not have the same options/capabilities. Balance between the two is ever changing.

Play this game if you like stealth/survival games. Play this game if you like games with a predator/prey dynamics. It's online, multiplayer, and is always changing. If you kinda like it now, come back in 6 months and try again.

I've played on-and-off for years. I'm not great at it, but I have fun. I'll take months off at a time. I'll play for months on end.

It's scary at first, maybe not for some but after it just adds to the experience rather than scare you. Really fun game especially with friends. Its a fun solo experience as well. You can play as a killer trying to murder 4 survivors or you can play as a survivor with or without friends and still have a full experience. Definitely worth a try if anything, just try not to play too scared or you won't improve as a survivor.

amazing

i'll continue to play this game as it's been one of my favourites through the years and have had many, MANY enjoyable hours. And although i love (starting to have loved, rather than love it still) the game, in it's current state it's something i wouldn't recommend. At least three out of every 5 games i will have a game breaking bug, of which the devs are more focused on buffing killers instead of fixing the current game. Nearly every game is a frustrating experience, with animations not matching the actions (such as window vaults freezing for .3 of a second where the devs made it slower, instead of just changing the animation speed too), and killers getting buffed like theres no tomorrow (not specific killer buffs, just overall things like say nerfing survivor perks slightly while increasing a killers movement speed slightly). I'm not salty about a good killer, i'm salty about the game constantly crashing due to 'Rank could not be updated' or some dumb shit like that. 

Look the game is still a decent game, but it's quality IMO has gone down in the past few months

hey a few hours after playing i came up with something else: can't go 4 games without some error kicking me out of a lobby/ loading/ the game in general, whether it's "no network connection" (it's connected lmao) or "could not update rank"/ "could not find your player rank" etc.. yeah nah

Very fun asymmetrical game overall. Balance starts to get a little problematic at higher skill levels but it's hard to beat the flavor and atmosphere that oozes out of every corner. Play if you don't mind some less-than-ideal competitive conditions, and if you can handle some toxicity from time to time; the moment to moment gameplay is generally rewarding if you can get past those speed bumps.

Luego de 4 mil pallets tirados , 456 ragequits hechos y miles de survivors tuneleados , puedo darle su respectiva evaluacion a esta joya.

Dead by Daylight es un juego 4v1 donde 1 jugador toma el rol de ''asesino'' y 4 de supervivientes.

Una cosa que me llamó la atención este juego es que rinde homenaje a las películas de terror de los 80'. La jugabilidad es igual de divertida, sin importar si estamos jugando al asesino o tratando de escapar de él.(Con amigos la diversión se quintuplica)

A veces puede ser ''LAG'', principalmente debido a que no son servidores dedicados. Sin embargo, eso no me impide divertirme jugando a este juego. Aunque es el mismo objetivo en cada juego tanto para el sobreviviente como para el asesino, hay una gran cantidad de ''habilidades''(perks) que te dan infinitas opciones para jugar de manera diferente en cada partida. Han pasado 2 años (también jugué en ps4) y todavía lo sigo jugando hasta el día de hoy.

Sin duda alguna, yo lo recomiendo yessirrrr yessirrrrrrr
Great game

*GAME IS GARBAGE*

Every update breaks the game in some way, bugs galore, toxic killers, toxic survivors.
A well programmed game shouldn't make you verify game files every patch, followed by having issues with connectivity and dedicated servers. 

same issues over and over again, FIX SOMETHING ANYTHING.

The community is slowly dropping because of these issues.

Not to mention the issue with the console players mixed in experienced pc players is stupid. (PC players know how to play, console players react too slowly or don't have good enough internet)  

Sadly i enjoyed this game, but now I'm just sick and tired of them not fixing anything.

Le jour ou les personnes qui prétendent être les développeurs de ce jeu vidéo comprendrons que babysitte les tueurs au détriment du fun qui existais autrefois sur ce jeu ne fais que faire fuir sa propre communauté, alors je reviendrai peut être dessus car pour le moment l'équilibrage survivant/tueur est dégueulasse au point où la moitié des tueurs peuvent à présent one-shot dès le début de games, les anciens tueurs qui étaient plutot équilibré ont été buff pour que les survivant n'ai plus la moindre chance.
C'est lassant de voir que les survivant sont juste des sacs de frappe pour les tueurs tellement ils sont affaiblies au fur et a mesure du développement du jeu.
J'apprécie ce jeu c'est pour ça que je laisse ce commentaire, il peut toujours être sauvé mais c'est aux développeur de faire quelque chose pas aux joueur malheureusement.
